str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To convulse, throw into spasms. Prolongation from spairo; to mangle, i.e. Convluse with epilepsy.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
